name: LastLine
description:
Defend the planet from alien invaders and try to top the global leaderboard!

This game was made for the ScoreSpaceJam #17.

This was my second game jam and I took on the challenge of creating all assets, including music and sound effects, myself. 

I hope you enjoy!

Known Bugs:

- Some computers have issue with stuttering, idk why

- Aspect ratios other than 16:9 have scaling issues
